Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Evan
Reviews.Content: Pretty high quality stuff for the deal I got. This camera is great for scenery shots, and still shots, not so much for just a fun run-around camera.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: David E. Evans
Reviews.Content: This is everything it promised to be.  It had a tough act to follow considering that I finally broke down and bought this to replace the Fuji SLR 35mm I purchased back in 1980  (loved that camera).  This one does everything and then some that the older one did. Buy this camera if you want versatility and ease of creativity.

Reviews.Title: LCD Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Carolyn A. Swafford
Reviews.Content: I love the quality of the pictures, and the ease of use of this camera. The instant availability of the picture to determine if retakes are needed is a big plus. I really enjoyed using it as an excellent method to preserve holiday memories.

ProductInfo.Features:
16MP 1/2.3" CCD Sensor
Fujinon 30x Optical Zoom Lens
35mm Equivalent Focal Length: 24-720mm
3.0" 230k-Dot LCD Monitor
HD 720p Video at 30fps
